wishwawidyala anadhyayana karyamandalayata hinga watupwalin siyayata 50k gewima sandaha kadinamin katayuthu karana bawa usas adhyapana amathi es. bi. disanayaka mahatha pawasayi.ee sandaha kabinat pathrikawak amathya mandalayata idiripath kara anumathiya laba ganimata katayuthu karana bawata amathiwaraya wruththiya samithi niyojithayin hamuwe porondu wi atha.anadhyayana sewakayanta balapana wiwidha gatalu sambandhayen sadharana wisandum laba dena bawatada amathiwaraya me niyojithayin hamu wu awasthawe di prakasha kara atha.me sakachchawata shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye pradhana lekam lesli dewendra, rajya sanstha anshaye lekam ranjith hettiaarachchi, wishwawidyala shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye sabhapathi di.pi.aar. thambaawita ha usas adhyapana amathyanshaye lekam aacharya sunil jayantha nawarathna, adhyaksha janaral kirthi mawallage mahathwaru sahabhagi wuha.nawa watup kramaye athi wishamathawan wenas kirima sandaha wishwawidyala prathipadana komisan sabhawa idiripath kara athi warthawa adhyayanaya kara kadinamin nirdesha idiripath karana lesa watup ha sewaka komisan sabhawe sabhapathiwarayata amathiwaraya mehidi upades di thibe.watup komisan sabhawen laba dena nirdeshayan da kadinamin kriyawata nanwimata mema sakachchawe di ekangathawayakata pamina atha..
